SecurityGroup.description: Party Admin group, has all party permissions.
Security Admin group, has all permissions to modify security settings in party manager.

CommunicationEvent.subject: Why i would use the OFBiz system

PartyRelationship.comments: Allows the DemoCustAgent to purchase on behalf of DemoCustCompany, ie purchase against BillingAccount
Specifies the DemoCustAgent is a member of the DemoCustCompany, for Price Rules, Promos, etc
